languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, the number of attacks made by the next {g|f:de2fa09b36314b2dafe09c3e8354d214}Blade Dance{/g} is increased by +1. This effect stacks up to <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> times.

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}desvía{/g} un ataque, el número de ataques de la próxima {g|f:de2fa09b36314b2dafe09c3e8354d214}Danza de espada{/g} aumenta en +1. Este efecto se acumula <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} por {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}</u> veces.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}が攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流す{/g}たび、次の{g|f:de2fa09b36314b2dafe09c3e8354d214}ブレード・ダンス{/g}で行う攻撃の数が+1増加する。この効果は最大<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>回スタックする。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, the number of attacks made by the next {g|f:de2fa09b36314b2dafe09c3e8354d214}Blade Dance{/g} is increased by +1. traits.locale_text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}が攻撃を{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}受け流す{/g}たび、次の{g|f:de2fa09b36314b2dafe09c3e8354d214}ブレード・ダンス{/g}で行う攻撃の数が+1増加する。この効果は最大<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}</u>回スタックする。

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Parry}招架{/g}1次攻击时，下次使用{g|f:de2fa09b36314b2dafe09c3e8354d214}利刃之舞{/g}时，攻击次数就会增加1次。此效果最多可叠加<u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}</u>次。

languages.text: Lorsque le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pare{/g} une attaque, le nombre d'attaques de la prochaine {g|f:de2fa09b36314b2dafe09c3e8354d214}Danse des Lames{/g} augmente de +1. Cet effet est cumulable jusqu'à <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g}</u> fois.

languages.text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g} einen Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pariert{/g}, wird die Anzahl der Angriffe beim nächsten {g|f:de2fa09b36314b2dafe09c3e8354d214}Klingentanz{/g} um +1 erhöht. Dieser Effekt ist bis zu <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u>-mal stapelbar.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}parries{/g} an attack, the number of attacks made by the next {g|f:de2fa09b36314b2dafe09c3e8354d214}Blade Dance{/g} is increased by +1. This effect stacks up to <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}AGI{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}</u> times.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzer{/g} einen Angriff {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}pariert{/g}, wird die Anzahl der Angriffe beim nächsten {g|f:de2fa09b36314b2dafe09c3e8354d214}Klingentanz{/g} um +1 erhöht. Dieser Effekt ist bis zu <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}BEW{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g}</u>-mal stapelbar.

languages.text: Когда {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцор смерти{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}парирует{/g} атаку, количество ударов в следующем {g|f:de2fa09b36314b2dafe09c3e8354d214}Танце клинков{/g} увеличивается на 1. Эффект суммируется до <u>{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ЛВК{/g}</u> раз.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Kılıç Dansçısı{/g}, her saldırı {g|Encyclopedia:Parry}savuşturduğunda{/g} bir sonraki {g|f:de2fa09b36314b2dafe09c3e8354d214}Kılıç Dansı{/g} kabiliyetiyle yapacağı saldırı sayısı +1 artar. Bu etki, en fazla <u>{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}ÇEV{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonusu{/g}</u> kadar üst üste birikebilir.
